name: Bloody Strikes
entries: At 3rd level, your injuries empower your strikes. You gain a Sanguine Die that can be used for various abilities. It begins as a d4, increasing its size by a step at 7th, 11th, 15th and 19th level. When you take damage from your Sanguine Die, the damage cannot be reduced/resisted in any way, and always hits your hitpoints if you have temporary hitpoints or other similar abilities.

Once per turn, when you deal damage from a weapon attack you can roll your Sanguine Die and add a bonus to your weaponâ€™s damage dice equal to twice the value on the number rolled. You then take the damage rolled on your Sanguine Die.
